Summary: one bright orb morphed into 4 flew around went back to one slightly changed color and vanished
divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving home heading north on norton road in ohio just came out of a town called darbydale, I noticed a bright light to my right. As soon as I noticed the light it split into two lights then three then four. They all started to move around in circles staying in the same area after o got stopped I tried ti get a picture of the lights and a recording with not much luck thats when they all formed a single light that was very bright. It disappeared for a second then reappeared as a slightly reddish orange light then started moving away by now ita seems like im following it but it was also climbing in altitude and finally disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Darbydale
This sighting has never been favorited.
